item.title: Research Obstructing Research
item.description: Gimble’s contact other plane goes a little off the rails, and he has a conversation with Gruumsh. The group try to come up with a new plan for dealing with Nyx’s pursuers, since their charade in Baldur’s Gate failed to pull them off of Nyx’s trail. Val tours the Court of Air looking for any possible way to get past the Emerald Door. Cassandra visits, and the first round of requested knowledge is delievered.

item.title: Arrival in Candlekeep
item.description: The party gains entry into Candlekeep and its outer Court of Air, but they are barred investigating the inner library themselves, despite Gimble’s insistence. Instead, they fill out numerous research requests and seek lodging to rest and prepare for what comes next.

item.title: Can I Get a Receipt?
item.description: Gimble fails to scry upon his pursuer, yet the party pushes on and teleports to Baldur’s Gate, where they make some noise about researching The Shard of Mystra. Horns enhances his wildshape ability, and Zed continues to evangelize the way of yoga. After the brief stop, they wind walk the remainder of their journey, alighting just outside the fortress of Candlekeep.

item.title: catch-22 items
item.description: The Menagerie make several purchases from Grundle & Chode’s Arcane Boutique, including a retainer for druids who like talking while wild-shaped. Gimble reaches a breaking point and leaves the party.

item.title: collecting blood for fun and profit
item.description: Horns grows a pair of wings, and Cassandra agrees to help the party in exchange for the bag of devouring. A tortle named Krull escorts the Menagerie from Arkhan’s tower to Arkhan himself. They negotiate a trade of the orb of dragonkind for a vial of Tiamat’s blood and Val backs down from dueling Arkhan. Uldrak’s empyrean form is restored, and on the way back to the Demon Zapper the party stops at a conveniently-relocated Wandering Emporium to shelter from an acid storm.

item.title: of motorcycles and newtonian physics
item.description: The Menagerie approach Arkhan’s tower and, upon seeing it guarded by a dragon, decide to recuperate and gather their strength instead of rushing in. Gimble casts identify on the orb of dragonkind. Gray is paid a visit by the Raven Queen who delivers an intercepted letter and a warning against the Feywild. A devilish warband starts a fight, and the party makes a new drow acquaintance.
